name: Plunder Patrollship Jord
text: 2 "Plunder Patroll" monsters/nDuring the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up "Plunder Patroll" card in your Spell & Trap Zone; return it to your hand, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "Plunder Patroll" monster from your hand. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 "Plunder Patroll" card; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy it, then if this card is equipped with a "Plunder Patroll" card, you can add 1 "Plunder Patroll" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Plunder Patrollship Jord" once per turn.
